title: A Silicon Element Quality Inspection System Based on YOLOv8
venue: Proceedings of the International Conference on Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition and Automation Engineering

title: Harmony in the Deep: Lamprey gender ratio model based on the Lotka-Volterra model
venue: In Proceedings of the International Conference on Modeling, Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning (CMNM '24)
excerpt: This paper explores a model based on the Lotka-Volterra equations to analyze the gender ratio of lampreys.

title: Credit Scoring Card Combination Optimization Model Based on QUBO

title: Modeling simulation of tower-type photovoltaic power plant -Optimization design of heliostat field based on particle swarm algorithm
excerpt: This paper presents a modeling simulation for optimizing the heliostat field design of a tower-type photovoltaic power plant.
